== EmbeddedTeam ==

=== Ubuntu Embedded Team ===

==== Overview ====
The Ubuntu Embedded Team will work towards the creation of tools, documention and a binary/source release for the purpose of running linux on small pc style hardware and true embedded hardware

==== Goals ====
The Goals of this project are to create the following environment in Ubuntu

* To create a micro version of Ubuntu suitable for read-only or flash booted systems
* Support having the root mounted in read-only
* Support live updates via apt (this must support updates of the read-only file system)
* Support install via configuration scripts "ala KickStart"
* Must install with the absolute minimum required to run Linux
* Unbuntu are used in other language and devicese

==== Issues ====

* How to have a read-only root but allow areas of the file system to be read-write with out symbolic used in some projects
* How to enable upgrades of the read-only root image while maintaining the read-only and read-write systems

* Darryl Ross
